#summary How-To install AntlrDT Plug-In in Eclipse

= Requirements =

  * Eclipse 3.5+ (Ganymede, Galileo...)
  * DLTK - Repository: http://download.eclipse.org/technology/dltk/updates/
  * ZEST - Repository: http://download.eclipse.org/tools/gef/updates/releases/
  * AntlrDT - Website: http://www.certiv.net/downloads/antlrdtdownload.html
  * Subclipse - Repository: http://subclipse.tigris.org/update_1.6.x

= Details =

  # Extract Eclipse in your preferred path
  # Via Update Manager, add the repositories and instll DLTK and ZEST (GEF)
  # Close Eclipse
  # Extract AntlrDT zip file and copy the content into `eclipse\dropins\`
  # Restart Eclipse
